title: (1) Segway T60 Tri-Wheel Electric Scooter with Seat & Basket (For Parts Only)
item_description:
(1) Segway T60 Tri-Wheel Electric Scooter with Seat & Basket (For Parts Only)

  • Model: T60
  • Power Source: Electric
  • Nominal Power: 350W
  • Max Speed: 15.5mph
  • Front & Rear Tire: 60/70-6.5
  • Approximate weight: 75 lb
  • Manufacturer: Ninebot(Changzhou) Tech Co., Ltd
  • No charger & battery.
  • For parts only
  • Unit powered by Segway
  • Photo Gallery Note: Representative photos were used for this lot.
